text: By those that race forward,He said:This means the spirits of the believers which raced to be the first in [doing] good (khayr) and [acting in] conformity (muwƒÅfaqa), and raced to be the first to respond to the Angel of Death out of longing (shawq) for their Lord. Subsequently, they departed with the most beautiful scent and the fullest joy.His words, Exalted is He:
